title: CBIC Extends Customs Integrated System EoI Deadline to January 31, 2026
content:
# CBIC Extends Customs Integrated System EoI Deadline to January 31, 2026

Ek important update hai. Central Board of Indirect Taxes and Customs (CBIC) ne apne proposed Customs Integrated System (CIS) ke Expression of Interest (EoI) submission ke liye deadline extend karne ka announce kiya hai.

*   **About the EoI:** This Expression of Interest is for appointing an implementation agency for the Customs Integrated System (CIS), which aims to unify key existing platforms like the Indian Customs Electronic Gateway, Risk Management System, and Indian Customs Electronic Data Interchange System into a single digital framework.
*   **Old Due Date:** Earlier, the deadline for purchasing EoI documents and submitting bids was January 21, 2026.
*   **New Due Date:** The revised notification has pushed the last date for EoI submission to **January 31, 2026**.
*   **Reason for Extension:** This extension has been granted following requests from prospective bidders who sought additional time to prepare and submit their proposals.
*   **Bid Opening:** The opening of bids has now been rescheduled to February 2, 2026.

## Read the Official Document
* [Visit the CBIC Homepage for latest updates](https://www.cbic.gov.in/)

*Published on: 30 January 2026*
